_comment: SUHII Analysis Configuration - See technical documentation for full details

_method_descriptions.ndvi: NDVI threshold only - WARNING: may include bare soil
_method_descriptions.lulc_ndvi: LULC + NDVI filter to exclude parks/vegetation

urban_selection._ndvi_max_note: For lulc_ndvi method: pixels with NDVI >= this are excluded (removes parks)

_method_descriptions.buffer: Fixed width ring around city boundary
_method_descriptions.halo: Skip urban footprint zone, then buffer
_method_descriptions.three_rings: Dynamic widths based on sqrt(area): Ua/FUa/PUa zones

buffer_params._min_distance_note: For 'halo' method: inner exclusion zone width
buffer_params._ring_type_options: ua | fua | pua (for three_rings method only)
buffer_params._min_rural_distance_note: For buffer/three_rings: exclude rural pixels closer than this to urban edge

rural_selection._vegetation_note: Rural pixels must have NDVI >= this value

elevation_params._note: Filters rural pixels to within ±initial_tolerance_m of urban mean elevation. Expands tolerance incrementally if insufficient pixels found.

_recommendations.lst: nearest - preserves actual measured radiometric values (recommended)
_recommendations.lulc: nearest - always used for categorical data (not configurable)

resampling._scientific_note: Bilinear interpolation creates artificial intermediate values at boundaries. For LST at urban-rural edges, this can underestimate the true temperature gradient.

outputs._debug_plots_note: When true, generates diagnostic visualizations in debug_plots/ subdirectory
